import data

```{r}
dat_cleaned <- read_csv("data_processed/dat_cleaned.csv")

model_dat <- read.csv("data_processed/model_dat_stressors.csv")
```
testing predictive validity of stressor scale

```{r}

m_baseline_ple <- 
  lmer(
    ple_cfa ~ stressor_mean_centered_int + (stressor_mean_centered_int | id_esm), data = model_dat)

m_baseline_ple_detrended <- 
  lmer(
    ple_cfa ~ stressor_mean_centered_int + day + beep + (stressor_mean_centered_int | id_esm), data = model_dat)


m_baseline_event <- 
  lmer(
    event_unpleasantness ~  stressor_mean_centered_int + (stressor_mean_centered_int | id_esm), data = model_dat)

m_baseline_event_detrended <- 
  lmer(
    event_unpleasantness ~  stressor_mean_centered_int + day + beep + (stressor_mean_centered_int | id_esm), data = model_dat)


tab_model(m_baseline_ple, m_baseline_ple_detrended, m_baseline_event, m_baseline_event_detrended,
          show.aicc = T, show.std = T)

saveRDS(m_baseline_ple_detrended, "models/m_baseline_ple_detrended.rds")
saveRDS(m_baseline_event_detrended, "models/m_baseline_event_detrended.rds")



```


### ~ ple

```{r}

m1 <- 
  lmer(
    ple_cfa ~ 
      day + beep + gender + age +
      stressor_mean_centered_int * mss_neg_score  +
      #     stressor_mean_centered_int * mss_pos_score  +
      #     stressor_mean_centered_int * mss_dis_score  +
      (stressor_mean_centered_int | id_esm), data = model_dat)

m2 <- 
  lmer(
    ple_cfa ~ 
      day + beep + gender + age +
      stressor_mean_centered_int * mss_neg_score  +
      stressor_mean_centered_int * mss_pos_score  +
      #     stressor_mean_centered_int * mss_dis_score  +
      (stressor_mean_centered_int | id_esm), data = model_dat)

m3 <- 
  lmer(
    ple_cfa ~ 
      day + beep + gender + age +
      stressor_mean_centered_int * mss_neg_score  +
      stressor_mean_centered_int * mss_pos_score  +
      stressor_mean_centered_int * mss_dis_score  +
      (stressor_mean_centered_int | id_esm), data = model_dat)
m4 <-
  lmer(
    ple_cfa ~
      day + beep + gender + age +
      # stressor_mean_centered_int * mss_neg_score  +
      # stressor_mean_centered_int * mss_pos_score  +
      stressor_mean_centered_int * mss_dis_score  +
      (stressor_mean_centered_int | id_esm), data = model_dat)


m5 <-
  lmer(
    ple_cfa ~
      day + beep + gender + age +
      # stressor_mean_centered_int * mss_neg_score  +
      stressor_mean_centered_int * mss_pos_score  +
      # stressor_mean_centered_int * mss_dis_score  +
      (stressor_mean_centered_int | id_esm), data = model_dat)


tab_model(m1, m2, 
          m3, m4, m5,
          show.aicc = T, show.std = T)

saveRDS(m1, "models/m1.rds")
saveRDS(m2, "models/m2.rds")
saveRDS(m3, "models/m3.rds")
saveRDS(m4, "models/m4.rds")
saveRDS(m5, "models/m5.rds")

```

```{r}
plot_model(m3, type = "diag")
vif(m3)
```
